entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -24.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Puvirnituq Airport 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -24.8°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -27.7°C
Wind: E 55 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Blizzard. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
